item.title: WAHA 2025.6 - Security in WAHA Core, Message Edit Event, and Media Conversion
item.description:
🆕 What’s New?

🔒 Security in WAHA Core

WAHA Core now comes with robust, built-in security features!
You can protect your API with an API Key - and now, for even greater security, you can store only the hash of your key using WAHA_API_KEY=sha512:{HASH}.
This means your API key is never stored in plain text, reducing the risk if your environment variables are exposed.

item.title: WAHA 2025.3
item.description:
We’re excited to roll out WAHA 2025.3!

GOWS 1.0

GOWS Engine just got its 1.0 moment!

Here’s what’s new:

  • Enable Link Previews - #763
  • Delete Status Message - #754
  • Delete Message - #796
  • Edit Message - #797
  • Reply To Message - #799
  • Add filename on /api/sendFile - #853
  • Extract replyTo - #876

NOWEB Stability

If you faced any issues with the NOWEB engine, like #821 , #860 , #869 we have fixed them in this release!
